metadata.synopsis: Quiet area away from the main streets. Somebody here has forgotten about her dead children, in blissful state.Lug is peacefully looking over the bridge, softly singing a lullaby. If spoken to, she laughs and tells you she’s had this song suck in her head for some reason! She doesn’t know any children, how odd.

0.speaker: Lug
0.text: Odd, isn't it? My parents never sang me lullabies - yet I've got one wormed in my mind, clear as day.
0.context: NodeContext: Confused as she thinks aloud - touch of unknowning sadness on the edge

1.speaker: Lug
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: humming a lullaby tune to herselfNodeContext: humming a lullaby tune to herself - use same tune as LOW_LullabyElf_VignetteAD

2.speaker: Lug
2.text: Pardon my singing. That lullaby's been stuck in my head since... Funny - I can't recall.
2.context: NodeContext: slightly embarassed laugh, you've been caught sining lullabies
